import React from 'react' import Input from '../../../../../Components/UI/Input/Input' import cl from './addItem.module.scss' const InputContainer = React.forwardRef((props, ref) => { const inputStyles = { maxWidth: '80%', padding: '7px 0 7px 5px', fontSize: '14px', } const enterKeyUp = e => (e.code === 'Enter' ? props.addNewCategory() : false) return (
) }) export default InputContainer
